params ) {\n            params = params || { bubbles: false, cancelable: false, detail: null };\n            var evt = document.createEvent( \'CustomEvent\' );\n            evt.initCustomEvent( event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail );\n            return evt;\n        }\n\n        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;\n\n        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent;\n d.currentScript || d.head.querySelector(\'script.js-entry\');\n\n                \n                function catchNoModuleSupport() {\n                    var scriptEl = d.createElement(\'script\');\n                    return (!(\'noModule\' in scriptEl) && \'onbeforeload\' in scriptEl)\n                }\n\n                var headScripts = [\n                    {\'src\':                } else if (script.module === false) {\n                        scriptEl.setAttribute(\'nomodule\', true)\n                    }\n                    if (script.charset) {\n                        scriptEl.setAttribute(\'charset\', script.charset);\n                    }\n\n                    return scriptEl;\n                }\n\n                for (var i = 0; i < headScripts.length; ++i) {\n                    var scriptEl = createScript(headScripts[i]);\n                    currentScript.parentNode.insertBefore(scriptEl, currentScript.nextSibling);\n role="img" src=/static/images/bmc/logos/logo-bmc-white-strapline-sn-f224388d67.svg>\n        </div>\n    </a>\n</div>\n\n            </div>\n            <div class="c-header__navigation">\n <div class="u-container u-mt-32 u-mb-32" id="main-content">\n            <div class="c-page-layout c-page-layout--landing">\n                <main class="c-page-layout__main">\n                    <h1>BMC, research in progress</h1>\n                    \n    \n        \n    <div class="cms-item cms-collection cms-collection--split cms-collection--untitled" data-fragment="6613216">\n        \n\n        <div class="cms-collection__row">\n            \n                <div class="cms-collection__column">\n                    <div class="cms-collection__column-inner">\n                        <div class="cms-item c-media" data-fragment="6623402">\n    \n    <div class="c-media__body">\n        \n\n        \n            <p>A pioneer of open access publishing, BMC has an evolving portfolio of high quality peer-reviewed journals including broad interest titles such as BMC Biology and BMC Medicine, specialist journals such as Malaria Journal and Microbiome, and the&nbsp;<a href="http://www.biomedcentral.com/p/the-bmc-series-journals" target="_blank" class="is-external">BMC Series</a>.<br /><br />Expanding beyond biomedicine into the physical sciences, mathematics and engineering disciplines, BMC now offers a wider portfolio of subject fields on a single open access platform.</p><p>At BMC, research is always in progress. We are committed to continual innovation to better support the needs of our communities, ensuring the integrity of the research we publish, and championing the benefits of open research. BMC is part of Springer Nature.</p>\n        \n    </div>\n</div>\n\n                    </div>\n                </div>\n            \n                <div class="cms-collection__column">\n                    <div class="cms-collection__column-inner">\n                        <div class="cms-item cms-video" data-fragment="15193154">\n    <div class="c-video c-video--miVMPro">\n        <div class="c-video__wrapper" data-test="video-test">\n            \n                <div class="c-video__content" >\n                    <p class="c-video__warning u-js-hide">\n                        Your browser needs to have JavaScript enabled to view this video\n                    </p>\n                    \n                        \n                            <iframe src="https://e.video-cdn.net/video?video-id&#x3D;4312z8mUGRLb5UPsLza27-&amp;player-id&#x3D;BqkQWre3LkAqChvd8mo--L&amp;channel-id&#x3D;00000" sandbox="allow-same-origin allow-scripts" title="video content"></iframe>\n                        \n                    \n                </div>\n            \n        </div>\n\n        \n    </div>\n</div>\n\n                    </div>\n                </div>\n            \n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n    \n        \n    <div class="cms-item cms-collection cms-collection--split cms-collection--untitled" data-fragment="17961376">\n        \n\n        <div class="cms-collection__row">\n            \n                <div class="cms-collection__column">\n                    <div class="cms-collection__column-inner">\n                        \n<div class="cms-item c-media c-media--stacked" data-fragment="17961410">\n    \n        <div class="c-media__figure">\n            \n                \n<div class="cms-item c-image-copyright" data-fragment="17961342">\n    <a href="/p/bmc-20th-anniversary" >\n    \n        <img src="//media.springernature.com/lw960/springer-cms/rest/v1/content/17961342/data/v1" alt="BMC 20th Anniversary logo medium"/>\n    \n    </a>\n    \n</div>\n\n\n            \n        </div>\n    \n    <div class="c-media__body">\n        \n\n        \n    </div>\n</div>\n\n                    </div>\n                </div>\n            \n                <div class="cms-collection__column">\n                    <div class="cms-collection__column-inner">\n                        <div class="cms-item" data-fragment="17961336">\n    \n    <h2>BMC 20th anniversary</h2>\n    \n    <div>\n        \n        <div class="u-mb-16-at-xxs u-mb-16-at-xs">\n            <p>This year BMC is celebrating its 20<sup>th</sup> year anniversary. We are excited about everything we have achieved in that time, especially about BMC\xe2\x80\x99s leadership role in the global growth of open access. We invite you to join us, as we look at BMC\xe2\x80\x99s achievements and future endeavours through interviews, videos and other resources we have created to commemorate our journey.</p>\n            \n                <a href="/p/bmc-20th-anniversary" class="u-button u-button--primary" data-test="teaser-button-link"> BMC 20th Year Anniversary Hub </a>\n            \n        </div>\n    </div>\n</div>\n\n                    </div>\n                </div>\n            \n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n    \n        \n    <div class="cms-item cms-collection cms-collection--split" data-fragment="17935912">\n        \n            <h2 class="cms-collection__title">Supporting the research community at this time</h2>\n        \n\n        <div class="cms-collection__row">\n            \n                <div class="cms-collection__column">\n                    <div class="cms-collection__column-inner">\n                        <div class="cms-item c-media c-media--stacked" data-fragment="17935914">\n    \n        <div class="c-media__figure">\n            \n                \n<div class="cms-item c-image-copyright" data-fragment="17935966">\n    <a href="https://www.springernature.com/gp/researchers/campaigns/coronavirus?utm_source&#x3D;bmc&amp;utm_medium&#x3D;referral&amp;utm_content&#x3D;null&amp;utm_campaign&#x3D;Homepage_Coronovirus_Teaser" class="p-corner-crop">\n    \n        <img src="//media.springernature.com/lw450/springer-cms/rest/v1/content/17935966/data/v1" alt="Covid19"/>\n    \n    </a>\n    \n</div>\n\n\n            \n        </div>\n    \n    <div class="c-media__body">\n        \n            <h2 class="c-media__title u-text-md">\n                \n                    <a href="https://www.springernature.com/gp/researchers/campaigns/coronavirus?utm_source&#x3D;bmc&amp;utm_medium&#x3D;referral&amp;utm_content&#x3D;null&amp;utm_campaign&#x3D;Homepage_Coronovirus_Teaser">SARS-CoV-2 and COVID-19</a>\n                \n            </h2>\n        \n\n        \n            <p>Springer Nature is committed to supporting the global response to emerging outbreaks by enabling fast and direct access to the latest available research, data, and resources for the research community</p>\n        \n    </div>\n</div>\n\n                    </div>\n                </div>\n            \n                <div class="cms-collection__column">\n                    <div class="cms-collection__column-inner">\n                        <div class="cms-item c-media c-media--stacked" data-fragment="17947658">\n    \n        <div class="c-media__figure">\n            \n                \n<div class="cms-item c-image-copyright" data-fragment="17947664">\n    <a href="https://www.biomedcentral.com/collections/coronavirus" class="p-corner-crop">\n    \n        <img src="//media.springernature.com/lw450/springer-cms/rest/v1/content/17947664/data/v2" alt="Covid 19"/>\n    \n    </a>\n    \n</div>\n\n\n            \n        </div>\n    \n    <div class="c-media__body">\n        \n            <h2 class="c-media__title u-text-md">\n                \n                    <a href="https://www.biomedcentral.com/collections/coronavirus">Coronavirus research highlights</a>\n                \n            </h2>\n        \n\n        \n            <p>This collection draws together research from across BMC journals, including broad scope titles such as&nbsp;<em>BMC Public Health, Virology Journal </em>and<em> Respiratory Research,</em>&nbsp;and our more specialist journals such as&nbsp;<em>Globalization and Health </em>and&nbsp;<em>Conflict and Health.&nbsp;</em></p>\n        \n    </div>\n</div>\n\n                    </div>\n                </div>\n            \n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n    \n        \n    <div class="cms-item cms-collection cms-collection--split cms-collection--untitled" data-fragment="18076862">\n        \n\n        <div class="cms-collection__row">\n            \n                <div class="cms-collection__column">\n                    <div class="cms-collection__column-inner">\n                        \n<div class="cms-item c-media c-media--stacked" data-fragment="18076846">\n    \n        <div class="c-media__figure">\n            \n                \n<div class="cms-item c-image-copyright" data-fragment="18076516">\n    <a href="https://www.springernature.com/gp/researchers/campaigns/black-lives-matter?utm_source&#x3D;bmc&amp;utm_medium&#x3D;referral&amp;utm_content&#x3D;RMarketing&amp;utm_campaign&#x3D;CMTL_1_RS_CMTL_BlackLivesMatter_BMC_HP_Teaser" >\n    \n        <img src="//media.springernature.com/lw960/springer-cms/rest/v1/content/18076516/data/v3" alt="BLM"/>\n    \n    </a>\n    \n</div>\n\n\n            \n        </div>\n    \n    <div class="c-media__body">\n        \n\n        \n    </div>\n</div>\n\n                    </div>\n                </div>\n            \n                <div class="cms-collection__column">\n                    <div class="cms-collection__column-inner">\n                        <div class="cms-item" data-fragment="18076860">\n    \n    <h2>Black Lives Matter</h2>\n    \n    <div>\n        \n        <div class="u-mb-16-at-xxs u-mb-16-at-xs">\n            <p>A collection of books, journal articles and magazine content that amplifies Black voices and the issues raised by the Black Lives Matter movement.</p>\n            \n                <a href="https://www.springernature.com/gp/researchers/campaigns/black-lives-matter?utm_source&#x3D;bmc&amp;utm_medium&#x3D;referral&amp;utm_content&#x3D;RMarketing&amp;utm_campaign&#x3D;CMTL_1_RS_CMTL_BlackLivesMatter_BMC_HP_Teaser" class="u-button u-button--primary" data-test="teaser-button-link"> Find out more </a>\n            \n        </div>\n    </div>\n</div>\n\n                    </div>\n                </div>\n            \n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n    \n        \n    <div class="cms-item cms-collection cms-collection--split" data-fragment="6616320">\n        \n            <h2 class="cms-collection__title">Editors&#x27; picks</h2>\n        \n\n        <div class="cms-collection__row">\n            \n                <div class="cms-collection__column">\n                    <div class="cms-collection__column-inner">\n                        <div class="cms-item c-media c-media--stacked" data-fragment="6613228">\n    \n        <div class="c-media__figure">\n            \n                \n<div class="cms-item c-image-copyright" data-fragment="16730910">\n    <a href="https://bmcmedicine.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s12916-020-01815-3" class="p-corner-crop">\n    \n        <img src="//media.springernature.com/lw450/springer-cms/rest/v1/content/16730910/data/v8" alt="Vaccines"/>\n    \n    </a>\n    \n        <p class="c-image-copyright__text">Credit: Getty Images</p>\n    \n</div>\n\n\n            \n        </div>\n    \n    <div class="c-media__body">\n        \n            <h2 class="c-media__title u-text-md">\n                \n                    <a href="https://bmcmedicine.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s12916-020-01815-3">Vegans, vegetarians and pescetarians may be at higher risk of bone fractures than meat eaters</a>\n                \n            </h2>\n        \n\n        \n            <p>Compared with people who ate meat, vegans with lower calcium and protein intakes on average, had a 43% higher risk of fractures anywhere in the body (total fractures), as well as higher risks of site-specific fractures of the hips, legs and vertebrae.</p><p><em>BMC Medicine 2020</em></p>\n        \n    </div>\n</div>\n\n                    </div>\n                </div>\n            \n                <div class="cms-collection__column">\n                    <div class="cms-collection__column-inner">\n                        <div class="cms-item c-media c-media--stacked" data-fragment="6614096">\n    \n        <div class="c-media__figure">\n            \n                \n<div class="cms-item c-image-copyright" data-fragment="6623460">\n    <a href="https://bmcpublichealth.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s12889-020-09139-w" class="p-corner-crop">\n    \n        <img src="//media.springernature.com/lw450/springer-cms/rest/v1/content/6623460/data/v83" alt="Work-life balance"/>\n    \n    </a>\n    \n        <p class="c-image-copyright__text">Credit: Pixabay</p>\n    \n</div>\n\n\n            \n        </div>\n    \n    <div class="c-media__body">\n        \n            <h2 class="c-media__title u-text-md">\n                \n                    <a href="https://bmcpublichealth.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/s12889-020-09139-w">Poor work-life balance may have negative health effects</a>\n                \n            </h2>\n        \n\n        \n            <p>Working adults across Europe with poor work-life balance are more likely to report poor general health.&nbsp;</p><p><em>BMC Public Health&nbsp;</em>2020</p>\n        \n    </div>\n</div>\n\n                    </div>\n                </div>\n            \n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n    \n        \n    <div class="cms-item cms-collection cms-collection--split cms-collection--untitled" data-fragment="13300900">\n        \n\n        <div class="cms-collection__row">\n            \n                <div class="cms-collection__column">\n                    <div class="cms-collection__column-inner">\n                            <div class="cms-item c-media c-media--stacked" data-fragment="15098592">\n    \n        <div class="c-media__figure">\n            \n                \n<div class="cms-item c-image-copyright" data-fragment="15090068">\n    <a href="https://bmcresnotes.biomedcentral.com/about/introducing-data-notes?utm_source&#x3D;website&amp;utm_medium&#x3D;Referral&amp;utm_campaign&#x3D;Data_Note_BMCHomepage_to_Landing_Page" class="p-corner-crop">\n    \n        <img src="//media.springernature.com/lw450/springer-cms/rest/v1/content/15090068/data/v3" alt="What is a Data Note?"/>\n    \n    </a>\n    \n</div>\n\n\n            \n        </div>\n    \n    <div class="c-media__body">\n        \n            <h2 class="c-media__title u-text-md">\n                \n                    <a href="https://bmcresnotes.biomedcentral.com/about/introducing-data-notes?utm_source&#x3D;website&amp;utm_medium&#x3D;Referral&amp;utm_campaign&#x3D;Data_Note_BMCHomepage_to_Landing_Page">BMC Research Notes Launches Data Notes</a>\n                \n            </h2>\n        \n\n        \n            <p>Data is becoming increasingly more important. Researchers tell us they want to share their data to progress research, to receive more credit and visibility for their work and to comply with funder policies.&nbsp; To help&nbsp;our authors do this, we have launched the data note.</p>\n        \n    </div>\n</div>\n\n                    </div>\n                </div>\n            \n                <div class="cms-collection__column">\n                    <div class="cms-collection__column-inner">\n                            <div class="cms-item c-media c-media--stacked" data-fragment="13300894">\n    \n        <div class="c-media__figure">\n            \n                \n<div class="cms-item c-image-copyright" data-fragment="13300898">\n    <a href="https://goo.gl/TLwXfJ" class="p-corner-crop">\n    \n        <img src="//media.springernature.com/lw450/springer-cms/rest/v1/content/13300898/data/v3" alt="New Content Item"/>\n    \n    </a>\n    \n</div>\n\n\n            \n        </div>\n    \n    <div class="c-media__body">\n        \n            <h2 class="c-media__title u-text-md">\n                \n                    <a href="https://goo.gl/TLwXfJ">Open Access Funding Support Service</a>\n                \n            </h2>\n        \n\n        \n            <p>Did you know that there almost 250 open access article processing charge (APC) funds available to researchers worldwide? At BMC, we offer a free advice service to help our authors to discover and apply for funding. On our support pages you can find our OA checklist along with a list of research funders and institutions that make APC funding available.<br /></p>\n        \n    </div>\n</div>\n\n                    </div>\n                </div>\n            \n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n    \n        \n    <div class="cms-item cms-collection cms-collection--split cms-collection--untitled" data-fragment="6616350">\n        \n\n        <div class="cms-collection__row">\n            \n                <div class="cms-collection__column">\n                    <div class="cms-collection__column-inner">\n                        \n    <div class="cms-item cms-collection" id="retrospectively+registered+trials" data-fragment="6622388">\n        \n            <h2 class="cms-collection__title">Retrospectively registered trials</h2>\n        \n        \n            <div class="cms-item c-media c-media--stacked" data-fragment="6616346">\n    \n        <div class="c-media__figure">\n            \n                \n<div class="cms-item c-image-copyright" data-fragment="7820102">\n    <a href="http://blogs.biomedcentral.com/bmcblog/2016/04/15/retrospectively-registered-trials-editors-dilemma/" class="p-corner-crop">\n    \n        <img src="//media.springernature.com/lw450/springer-cms/rest/v1/content/7820102/data/v3" alt="Registered Trials"/>\n    \n    </a>\n    \n        <p class="c-image-copyright__text">Pixabay</p>\n    \n</div>\n\n\n            \n        </div>\n    \n    <div class="c-media__body">\n        \n            <h2 class="c-media__title u-text-md">\n                \n                    <a href="http://blogs.biomedcentral.com/bmcblog/2016/04/15/retrospectively-registered-trials-editors-dilemma/">The Editors\xe2\x80\x99 dilemma</a>\n                \n            </h2>\n        \n\n        \n            <p>Prospective clinical trial registration aims to address publication and reporting bias. Unfortunately, not all clinical trials are registered before they start.&nbsp;Here we discuss the dilemma faced by editors when receiving submissions reporting a clinical trial that was not registered prospectively, and a new policy for increasing transparency when a trial was registered after participant recruitment has begun.</p>\n        \n    </div>\n</div>\n\n        \n    </div>\n\n\n                    </div>\n                </div>\n            \n                <div class="cms-collection__column">\n                    <div class="cms-collection__column-inner">\n                        \n    <div class="cms-item cms-collection" id="through+the+looking+glass" data-fragment="6632746">\n        \n            <h2 class="cms-collection__title">Through the looking glass</h2>\n        \n        \n            <div class="cms-item c-media c-media--stacked" data-fragment="6632586">\n    \n        <div class="c-media__figure">\n            \n                \n<div class="cms-item c-image-copyright" data-fragment="6632744">\n    <a href="http://blogs.biomedcentral.com/bmcseriesblog/2016/07/22/citizen-science-looking-glass/" class="p-corner-crop">\n    \n        <img src="//media.springernature.com/lw450/springer-cms/rest/v1/content/6632744/data/v10" alt="Citizen science: through the looking glass"/>\n    \n    </a>\n    \n</div>\n\n\n            \n        </div>\n    \n    <div class="c-media__body">\n        \n            <h2 class="c-media__title u-text-md">\n                \n                    <a href="http://blogs.biomedcentral.com/bmcseriesblog/2016/07/22/citizen-science-looking-glass/">Citizen science</a>\n                \n            </h2>\n        \n\n        \n            <p>In this blog, Poppy Lakeman Fraser, Senior Programme Coordinator for the Open Air Laboratories (OPAL) initiative, explains what citizen science actually is and how researchers rely on this form of data collection.</p>\n        \n    </div>\n</div>\n\n        \n    </div>\n\n\n                    </div>\n                </div>\n            \n        </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n    \n        \n    <div class="cms-item cms-collection cms-collection--split cms-collection--untitled" data-fragment="6635296">\n        \n\n        <div class="cms-collection__row">\n            \n                <div class="cms-collection__column">\n                    <div class="cms-collection__column-inner">\n                        <div data-test="rss-feed" class="cms-item" data-fragment="6635228">\n    \n        \n            \n    <h2 data-test="rss-feed-title">From our blogs</h2>\n    \n        <div class="c-box c-box--borderless" data-test="rss-feed-container">\n            <ul class="c-list-group c-list-group--bordered c-list-group c-list-group--md">\n                \n                    <li class="c-list-group__item">\n                        <article class="c-media c-media--sm">\n                            \n                            <div class="c-media__body">\n                                <h3 class="c-media__title">\n                                    \n                                        <a href="https://blogs.biomedcentral.com/bugbitten/2022/01/07/parasitology-and-conservation-what-parasites-can-tell-us-about-endangered-species-and-their-management-the-case-of-the-eurasian-lynx-in-germany/">Parasitology and Conservation: what parasites can tell us about endangered species and their management. The case of the Eurasian Lynx in Germany.</a>\n                                    \n                                </h3>\n                                \n                                    <p class="u-text-sm">07 January 2022</p>\n                                \n                            </div>\n                        </article>\n                    </li>\n                \n                    <li class="c-list-group__item">\n                        <article class="c-media c-media--sm">\n                            \n                            <div class="c-media__body">\n                                <h3 class="c-media__title">\n                                    \n                                        <a href="https://blogs.biomedcentral.com/bugbitten/2021/12/31/congratulations-you-survived-2021/">Congratulations! You survived 2021!</a>\n                                    \n                                </h3>\n                                \n                                    <p class="u-text-sm">31 December 2021</p>\n                                \n                            </div>\n                        </article>\n                    </li>\n                \n                    <li class="c-list-group__item">\n                        <article class="c-media c-media--sm">\n                            \n                            <div class="c-media__body">\n                                <h3 class="c-media__title">\n                                    \n                                        <a href="https://blogs.biomedcentral.com/bugbitten/2021/12/24/seasons-greetings-from-bugbitten/">Seasons greetings from BugBitten</a>\n                                    \n                                </h3>\n                                \n                                    <p class="u-text-sm">24 December 2021</p>\n                                \n                            </div>\n 18">\n            <path d="M9 0a9 9 0 110 18A9 9 0 019 0zm3.486 4.982l-4.718 5.506L5.14 8.465a.991.991 0 00-1.423.133 1.06 1.06 0 00.13 1.463l3.407 2.733a1 1 0 001.387-.133l5.385-6.334a1.06 1.06 0 00-.116-1.464.991.991 0 00-1.424.119z" fill-rule="evenodd"/>\n        </symbol>\n        <symbol id="icon-chevron-down" viewBox="0 0 16 16">\n            <path d="m5.58578644
